results.name: a(1) = 1, a(2) = 2; thereafter a(2n+1) = |a(2n)^2-a(2n-1)^2|, a(2n+2) = 2*a(2n-1)*a(2n).
comment: s = 1 and t = 2 are the initial seed numbers; they give the first Pythagorean pair x = 3, y = 4. Then take s = x, t = y for next seed numbers; these give the next Pythagorean pair x = |s^2-t^2|, y = 2st. Then take s = x, t = y and so on.
